results.text: Neppa d Öebbi, ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa, Amusnaw n wayen iffren akked wayen ur neffir. Neppa, d Aênin Ipêunun.
D Neppa, ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa, ay d Agellid, d Ssid, d Tifrat, d Bab n liman, d Aâssas, d Uzmir, d Ajebbaô, d Ameqwôaêan. Gedha s Öebbi, mgal wayen pcaraken!
Neppa d Öebbi, d Axellaq, d Bab usisi, d Amessal. I Neppa ismawen imxulaf mavi. Sbuccuâen T akw kra illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab.
